atk_abil: Normal Attack: Throws a fire spell that hits up to 2 enemies, stunning and damaging them.
Skill Attack: Drawing upon the Salamenders latent powers, hurls a flurry of fireballs to damage and paralyze the enemy.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 5%, movement speed of Human units by 5% and attack range by 3%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000
Senior Instructor (Human): Increases the production speed of Human guild unit by 7% per 5-star unit, 15% per 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but can not exceed 150%.
Raging Dash: Increases the maximum value of the game speed buff. 0.5% for each 5-star, 1% for each 6-star. However, it cannot exceed 10%. (Effects are not applied in Time Shop.)
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Throws a fire spell that hits up to 2 enemies, stunning and damaging them.
Skill Attack: Drawing upon the Salamenders latent powers, hurls a flurry of fireballs to damage and paralyze the enemy.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 10%, movement speed of Human units by 7% and attack range by 6%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000
Senior Instructor (Human): Increases the production speed of Human guild unit by 7% per 5-star unit, 15% per 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but can not exceed 150%.
Raging Dash: Increases the maximum value of the game speed buff. 0.5% for each 5-star, 1% for each 6-star. However, it cannot exceed 10%. (Effects are not applied in Time Shop.)
